summary: Adds Distel Elmlock, a teenage Breton Spellsword to the temple of Kyraneth.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/5121/backgroundwik.jpg[/IMG]

===================================
============Description=============
===================================

As a headstrong teenager without a family, Distel journeyed from her home in Bruma in the Provice of Cyrodiil all the way to Skyrim. She tried to make her way to the College of Winterhold to perfect her magicka usage, but tired out in Whiterun where she picked up a job at the Temple of Kyraneth. There she can be found, hoping that you may bring her to the College, or maybe train her yourself. She specializes in Frost magic, but keeps a fireball spell handy to use for those resistant to frost.

She is eager to go, so there are no prerequisites to have her as a follower. She is also available for marriage (normal prerequisites or required for that, though).

===================================
============Requirements============
===================================

Skyrim, nothing else.

===================================
=============Compatibly=============
===================================

Distel is completely standalone and compatible with just about any mod out there.
She has been tested with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933]EFF[/url] and they both work without any issues.

===================================
===============Credits===============
===================================

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Caliente\'s (NeverNude) Full Body Mod[/url] (not safe link for work!)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554]CBBE Skin Texture V3[/url] (not safe link for work!)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812]Better Females by Bella[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]The Eyes of Beuaty[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4502]Better Freckles[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31797]Azar\'s Ponytail Hairstyles[/url]


ONLY for the pictures
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909]aMidianborn Book of Silence[/url] for the leather armor.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33391/]Face Masks of Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18981]New animations for 1H Weapons[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28428]New Animations for Magic Casting[/url] for her fighting style.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23179]Sit Anywhere[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27563]Wet and Cold[/url] gave her Frostcloak that frosty look.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802]Climates of Tamriel[/url] for outside lighting
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23765]SkyRealism - ENB Evolved[/url] for the awesome realistic immersion and Depth of Field.

[IMG]http://img854.imageshack.us/img854/8526/bladez.jpg[/IMG]

[/center]
author: Hymnael
